DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the current study is to determine the acute effect of a glucose drink and a sacharose drink compared to a placebo on cognitive performance in elderly with light memory complaints. The investigators expect that the sugar containing drinks will improve memory and attentional functions. Furthermore, blood glucose response will be measured.
DOC.brief_title: Short-term Effect of Glucose and Sacharose Ingestion on Cognitive Performance and Mood in Elderly
DOC.criteria: Men and women 70 years and older Memory complaints Type I or II diabetes Parkinson disease MMSE < 25 (to exclude cognitively impaired subjects CESD > 16 (to exclude depressive subjects) Pharmacological antidepressives or medication for dementia Liver disease
